sentences: The trio were founded in 1975, when English folk musician Andy Leggett (see Pigsty Hill Light Orchestra) met singer Teri Penfold (his future wife) at a party and suggested that she should contact Angie Masterton and Eiri Thrasher to form a singing trio.
Shortly after they appeared on a UK radio show with Geoff Love and his Orchestra.
While touring with Georgie Fame, they were backed by guitarist Kit Morgan who is still backing Kate McNab today.
